José Luis es un hombre sobresaliente muy trabajador, responsable, tanto para su trabajo como para sus hijos, el presta el servicio de fotografía,  filmación de videos, al igual que edita trabajos para darles una mejor calidad a los clientes, brinda sus servicios en la ciudad de Chichigalpa cuando sedan actividades como casamientos, quinceaños, graduaciones, cumpleaños entre otros, a él siempre le ha gustado la fotografía labor que desempeña desde hace 25 años. El necesita financiamiento para comprar una cámara de toma de videos con mayor capacidad y moderna que las que ya tiene, el cual con esta cámara le permitirá prestar in servicio con más calidad y aún mejor precio y asi dar mejor servicio que sus competidores, uno de sus sueños es poder establecer un estudio de videos y fotografías con la tecnología más moderna posible
texts.en:
Jose Luis, 53 years old, is unmarried with two children, 19 and 10 years old. Currently, the 19-year-old does not study, but instead works, and the 10-year-old girl is in the fifth grade of primary school. He is originally from the town of Chichigalpa, a place that is located in the western zone of the country. Jose Luis is an outstanding man who is very hardworking and responsible, as much in his work as with his children.

He provides photography and video filming services, as well as editing, to give his customers better quality goods. He provides his services in the city of Chichigalpa when activities like weddings, fifteenth birthdays, graduations, and birthdays, among others, occur. He has always enjoyed photography, work that he has performed for 25 years.

He needs financing to buy a video camera with a higher capacity and more modern than the one he already has. This camera will allow him to provide service with higher quality and at an even better price, and therefore be able to provide a better service than his competitors. One of his dreams is to be able to establish a video and photography studio with the most modern technology possible.

loans.use: to buy a higher capacity and better quality video camera.

loans.name: Mario Bilomar

texts.es: Don Mario trabajo 12 años en la panadería de sus padres, primeramente empezó como ayudante, ahora el monto su propia panadería y vende sus productos en un carretón, en un centro muy visitado por personas, con sus ingresos ha mantenido a su hijo de 4 años y a su esposa quien le ayuda a vender, esta es su primer experiencia crediticia el cual lo necesita para comprar harina, manteca, queso, levadura para aumentar la suma de pan, con este negocio don Mario también ha logrado comprar su casita, por eso el desea invertir más en su dependencia para que le genere mejores ganancias y así con el tiempo ir amueblando su hogar, ponerla bonita y ofrecer a su familia una vivienda digna.
texts.en: Mario worked for twelve years at his parents' bakery, where he started as an apprentice. He now has his own bakery and sells his products from a cart, at a very frequented market. He supports his four year-old son and his wife, who helps him when selling. This is Mario's first loan. He needs the money to buy flour, butter, cheese, and baking soda, in order to bake greater quantities of bread. Thanks to his business, Mario managed to buy a house of his own. He wants to invest more in his business so as to increase his income and, in due time, buy furniture for his home, decorate it and provide his family with a decent place to live.

loans.use: to buy the ingredients needed to bake bread.

loans.name: Álvaro De Jesús

texts.es:
Álvaro de 54 años de edad dedicó la mayor parte de su vida al oficio de la construcción; debido a la inestabilidad en la contratación, se vio en la necesidad de buscar otra fuente de ingresos para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Gracias a la sugerencia de un amigo don Álvaro decidió montar una legumbrería móvil, con la cual recorre las calles del municipio de Itagüí en búsqueda de clientes todos los días de nueve de la mañana a 6 de la tarde. 

Su mayor anhelo es poder mejorar su condición económica para ofrecerle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Para cumplir este propósito se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de una carreta de madera para transportar la legumbre y surtido.
texts.en:
Álvaro, 54, has spent most of his life in the construction industry. Given the uncertainty of employment, he found it necessary to find another source of income to support his household. At his friend Alvaro's suggestion, he decided to use a vegetable cart to travel the streets of Itagüí every day, selling to customers from 9 am until 6 pm.

His great wish is to improve his financial situation and offer his family a better life. To achieve this, he is applying for a loan to buy a wood cart to transport his vegetables and other items.

loans.use: to buy a wood cart and vegetables.

loans.name: Beatriz Elena

texts.es:
Beatriz Elena de 32 años de edad, es una mujer que tiene claro que con esfuerzo y disciplina se pueden alcanzar los sueños. Diariamente abre su negocio a las siete de la mañana y comienza su faena. Manifiesta que su negocio lo ha construido con mucho sacrificio y agradece a Dios las bendiciones que diariamente recibe, pues gracias a su trabajo su hija de 11 años, puede asistir a la escuela y disfrutar de su niñez. 
Beatriz es una mujer con una gran visión de empresaria, su mayor deseo es poder posicionar su negocio e incrementas las ventas. Para lograrlo se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de mercancía-licor, gaseosa-mecatos- con el propósito de amentar sus ingresos.
texts.en: Beatriz Elena is 32 years old. She firmly believes that efforts and discipline can help her make her dreams become reality. She opens her shop at seven every morning and starts her working day. She tells us of the great sacrifices necessary to set up her business and thanks God for the blessings of each day, since thanks to her business her eleven year-old daughter can go to school and enjoy her childhood. Beatriz has an ambitious business vision, and her greatest wish is to position her shop on the market to increase her sales. To that end, she is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise to sell (alcohol, fizzy drinks, snacks) in order to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Marcia Del Socorro

texts.es: Marcia Del Socorro 45 años de edad, casada con dos hijos ambos mayores de edad 24 y 20años son independientes, originaria de Chichigalpa, ella es propietaria de un negocio de venta de granos básicos en el mercado central de esta ciudad, las compras las realiza al contado en distribuidoras al por mayor, así también en trilladoras y/o desgranadoras, las ventas las realiza al contado y en temporadas de zafra ella ofrece al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales, ella hace poco adquiere un lugar más para ampliar su negocio, ella nos expresa que gracias al apoyo ha logrado aumentar más su negocio y así ofrecerle mejores productos a  sus clientes. Ella nos está solicitando financiamiento para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, Maíz, Frijoles, Aceite, Jabón, entre otros.
texts.en:
Marcia Del Socorro is 45 years old. She is married with two adult children, 24 and 20 years old and independent. Originally from Chichigalpa, she is the owner of a business that sells basic grains in the central market of this city. She makes her purchases in cash at distributors in wholesale, and also at threshers and/or hullers. She makes her sales in cash and in the harvest season, she provides her goods in cash and credit to regular and occasional customers. She recently acquired another place to expand her business. 

She tells us that thanks to the support, she has managed to increase her business more and therefore offer better products to her customers. She is requesting funding to buy basic grains, like rice, sugar, corn, beans, and oil, and soap, among others.

loans.use: to invest more in her work capital, and therefore offer a large variety of products to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy the materials necessary to make furniture.

loans.name: Las Alpaquitas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ALPAQUITAS”  iniciará segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Magari es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: confección de enaguas, venta de vestidos, confección de polleras, tienda de barrio, confección de mantas, venta de verduras.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Magari es integrante, ella indica que hace un año que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una asesora de la institución que le fue a visitar a su casa. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de elaboración y venta de polleras que emprendió en una institución técnica posteriormente decide abrir su propia microempresa.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de tela) que adquirirá de las ferias de la ciudad de El Alto, por mayor, y posteriormente a la elaboración lo comercializará en la frontera de Bolivia y Perú. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos económicos para su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones en salud y crédito.
texts.en: Alpaquitas Group is starting its second cycle with field partner Pro Mujer, in the framework of the focus centre of Panamericana. It comprises eight members and has an executive board, with Magari as president. The members of the group are engaged in various activities, among them lace weaving, dress sales, dressmaking, grocery shop, plaid weaving, vegetable sales. This loan will thus benefit a group of very small entrepreneurs. Magari tells us that she has been working with Pro Mujer for one year. She got to know this field partner thanks to a spokesperson who came to visit her at her house. Magari makes and sells skirts. She learned at a school and then decided to start her own small business. She wants to take out a loan in order to increase her working capital and buy cloth at the markets of the town of El Alto, at a very good price. Afterwards, she will be able to sell her wares near the border between Bolivia and Peru. The income Magari derives from her business enables her to help with household expenses, since she is married and has two children. When asked what she likes about working with Pro Mujer, she talks about the training received on topics such as health and credit options.

loans.use: to buy cloth.

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es:
Doña Reyna Isabel habita en el caserío Los Limones ubicado a 3 km del Sauce, una comarca rural donde la mayoría de sus habitantes se dedican a la actividad ganadera por la ventaja de la característica de la zona que abunda el pasto para la buena alimentación del ganado.
Esta señora heredó esta vocación de ser ganadera de su padre el cual le inculcó el amor al campo y a los animales.
Hoy en día trabaja en conjunto con su esposo y sus hijos en la crianza de terneros para su posterior venta y la comercialización de leche la cual la vende a acopiadores que se encargan de exportarla por la buena calidad de la misma.
Cuenta con su humilde finca y su hato ganadero que ha ido creciendo por el esfuerzo propio de su familia.
Necesita un crédito para la compra de cuatro terneros para engordarlos y luego venderlos y de esta pequeña ganancia que obtiene sustenta a su familia.

Confía en Dios que Kiva y Ceprodel aprueben su solicitud para llevar a cabo su inversión y así generar ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Reyna Isabel lives in a community called Los Limones, located 3 kilometers from Sauce, a rural region where the majority of its inhabitants work in cattle breeding. The region has an advantageous characteristic: its abundant pasture for feeding livestock.

This woman was taught the profession of being a livestock breeder by her father, who instilled in her a love for the country and animals.  Now, she works with her husband and her sons in raising calves for their future sale, and sells milk to workers who take charge of exporting it because of its high quality.

She counts on her humble farm and her herd of livestock that has grown due to her family's efforts.  She needs a loan to buy four calves to fatten them and later sell them, and sustain her family from this small profit.

She trusts in God that Kiva and Ceprodel will approve the request to carry out her investment and generate income for her family.

loans.use: to buy four calves

loans.name: Anielka Karina

texts.es:
La joven Anielka Karina es originaria de la calle real donde nació y creció, es una joven emprendedora, soltera que gracias al esfuerzo de sus padres se preparó como Lic. en Lengua y Literatura ya que le apasiona la lectura y es lo que les transmite a sus alumnos a los cuales les imparte clases.

Labora como maestra de secundaria en la comarca las Mojarras donde a diario se levanta a las 4 am para poder estar puntual en su centro de trabajo donde viaja en autobús recorriendo 60 km.
Como responsable de la estabilidad y bienestar de sus padres desea darles mejores condiciones de vida ya que ellos dependen de ella, por tal razón está solicitando un crédito para mejora de vivienda con el cual comprará ladrillos y cemento para ampliar un cuarto con el fin de tener más espacio en la vivienda.
Por los bajos salarios que se gana en nuestro país muchas veces no se pueden cumplir los sueños pero con la buena voluntad y misericordia de los inversionistas  kiva mejoran el nivel de vida y económico de las personas a través de estos préstamos por ese motivo espera le concedan esta solicitud para poco a poco ir cumpliendo sus sueños.
texts.en:
The young woman, Anielka Karina, still lives on the same street where she was born and grew up. She is a young, single entrepreneur who, thanks to the effort of her parents, trained in language and literature since she loves reading. That is transmitted to the students she teaches.

She works as a high school teacher in the Mojarras region where she rises at 4am daily and travels 60km by bus in order to be punctual at her workplace.

She is responsible for the stability and well-being of her parents and wants to give them better living conditions, since they depend on her. For this reason, she is requesting a loan to improve their home by buying bricks and cement to expand a room to have more living space.

Because of the low salaries earned in her country, many times people are unable to fulfill their dreams. But, with the goodwill and compassion of the Kiva lenders, they can improve their standard of living and the economy of the people through these loans. For that reason, she hopes they will grant her this request to gradually fulfill her dreams.

loans.use: to buy bricks and cement.

loans.name: Manuela Magdalena

texts.es:
La señora Manuela Magdalena esa casada, tienen  34años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 2 están estudiando, se dedica a comercio a la venta de ropa de mujeres, inicio este negocio tendiendo un poco de capital y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien es transportista.

Solicita un préstamo que solicita para la compra de mercadería para la venta, espera comprar mas venta, consistente en blusas, cortes, delantales, guipiles, etc. Esto con el fin que tenga mejores oportunidades de vender, y poder mas adelante tener otros puntos de venta. Así podrá darle una mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Manuela Magdalena is 34 years old, married, and has completed six years of primary education. She has four children, two of whom are studying. Manuela sells women’s clothing, and she started her business with just a little capital. She has six years of experience so far, with the support of her husband who is a shipper. 

Manuela is asking for a loan to purchase merchandise to sell like blouses, skirts, aprons, and traditional clothing, etc., so that she can have better opportunities to sell, and later on be able to have other sales outlets. In this way, she will be able to give her family a better life.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: El Futuro Del Mañana Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “El Futuro del Mañana” que  conforman 05 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 05. Eduardo tiene 30 años, soltero. Eduardo se dedica desde hace 06 años a la venta de comida, cuenta con clientes fidelizados. El sueño de Eduardo es ampliar más su negocio para así poder atender mejor a sus clientes. El crédito que solicito lo destinara para la compra de arroz, aceite, papa, pollo. Eduardo está muy contento con este préstamo y agradece a los inversionistas Kiva. Eduardo se encuentra en la parte de atrás es el tercero del lado derecho, viste polo plomo y jean.
texts.en: This is the Future of Tomorrow Group which has five members that are involved in a variety of businesses. They are in their 5th cycle of borrowing. Eduardo is single and 30 years old. He has been selling food for 6 years, and has a loyal customer base. Eduardo’s dream is to grow his business so that he will be able to serve his customers better. The loan he asks for will be used to buy rice, cooking oil, potatoes and chicken. Eduardo is very happy with this loan and thankful to KIVA’s investors. He is the third from the right dressed in jeans and a gray shirt.

loans.use: to buy rice, cooking oil, potatoes, and chicken.

loans.name: Cándida Paula

texts.es:
En la ciudad de León al occidente de Nicaragua habita la Sra. Cándida Paula, una señora de 42 años que ha vivido toda su vida en dicha ciudad, se desempeña como maestra de primaria donde tiene 19 años de laborar y que por la necesidad de contar con un empleo y tener el sustento para su hogar tuvo que trasladarse hasta la comarca las Mojarras la cual queda a uno 90 km de su ciudad natal.
En ese humilde caserío imparte clases de primaria a niños de escasos recursos los cuales muchas veces no tienen para comprar un par de zapatos y tienen que asistir así al colegio pero con la voluntad de querer aprender a leer y escribir.

Esta señora con mucha dedicación desempeña su labor porque considera el gran esfuerzo que estos niños bajo su pobreza asisten a la escuela, el mismo esfuerzo que tiene por sacar a delante a su único hijo en cual estudia una carrera universitaria y que le cuesta solamente a ella porque no tiene el apoyo del padre.
Con gran sacrificio ha mejorado poco a poco su vivienda y en este momento está necesitando un crédito y el apoyo incondicional de Ceprodel a través de los inversionistas Kiva para ponerle cerámica a su casa con el cual comprara cerámica, cemento y pago de mano de obra. Con mucha fé espera este poyo.
texts.en:
In the city of León in western Nicaragua lives Cándida Paula, a 42 year old woman who has lived her entire life in this city. She works as a teacher at a primary school where she has been for 19 years. 

Due to the necessity of counting on a job and having a livelihood for her household, she had to move to the district of Mojarras, which is located 90 kilometers from her hometown. In this humble village, she teaches primary classes to underprivileged children, who often aren’t able to purchase a pair of shoes and have to go to school like that – but always with the will to learn to read and write. 

This woman carries out her work with much dedication, because she has in mind the great effort with which these children, under their poverty, attend school. This is the same effort that she puts toward getting her only child ahead, who is studying for a professional career; the cost is upon her alone, because she doesn’t have support from the father.  

With a lot of sacrifice, she has improved her home little by little, and at this time she needs a loan and the unconditional support of Ceprodel through the Kiva lenders, which she will use to buy tiles, cement, and to pay for labor. With a great deal of faith, she hopes for this support.

loans.use: to purchase tiles, cement, and to pay for labor.

loans.name: Jaqueline María

texts.es:
La joven Jaqueline María es originaria de la comarca Los Zarzales pero desde hace un año se trasladó a vivir a la comarca las Mojarras por las circunstancias de la vida y por adquirir experiencia como maestra de primaria impartiendo clases en el colegio de dicha comunidad.
Es una joven emprendedora que estudió la carrera de Magisterio y a pesar de su corta edad, que por su buena conducta la ascendieron a directora de dicho centro.
Hoy en día ya terminó la carrera pero necesita tramitar su título universitario para tener un mejor nivel social y por ende un mejor nivel económico porque aumenta su salario lo cual es muy costoso por lo que necesita un crédito para llevar a cabo dicho trámite.
Confía en Dios y pide el apoyo a Kiva a través de Ceprodel para que le faciliten este crédito ya que sin ello no puede cumplir su sueño de tener su título ya que actualmente gana muy poco.
texts.en:
The young Jaqueline María is from the region of Los Zarzales, but a year ago she moved to the region of Mojarras due to her personal life circumstances and also to gain experience as an elementary school teacher in said region. She is a young entrepreneur who has studied a career in education and despite her young age, because of her good behavior, she has become the director of the previously mentioned school. 

She has finished her studies, but she still needs to submit the paperwork necessary to receive her university degree itself, which is a very expensive process. She would use the loan to pay for this expensive process, which will help her improve her social standing and thus enter a higher economic level because receiving her degree will increase her salary. 

She confides in God and asks for Kiva's help through CEPRODEL to give her a loan, since without it she will not be able to achieve her dream of obtaining her university degree and increase her very modest salary.

loans.use: to pay for the paperwork necessary to receive her university degree.

loans.name: Antonia Del Socorro

texts.es:
Doña Antonia del Socorro es una señora de 41 años, soltera, madre de dos hijos en edad escolar, originaria del caserío la Quimera al occidente de león.
Se dedica a la labor de maestra de primaria con una experiencia de 20 años que le ha permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar y como mujer luchadora y emprendedora ha sido madre y padre para sus hijos porque les ha dado desde amor y bienestar sin la ayuda del padre.
Como madre responsable viaja diario 90 km para poder llegar a la escuela donde imparte clases a niños de escasos recursos pero con el ánimo siempre de transmitirle lo mejor que puede a sus alumnos.
Con el fin de mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda está solicitando a Kiva a través de Ceprodel un financiamiento para comprar ladrillos, inodoro y lavamano, ya que actualmente cuentan con una letrina en malas condiciones que resulta ser muy peligroso para su familia.
Espera que estos inversionistas le apoyen con su solicitud para mejora dichas condiciones.
texts.en:
Antonia del Socorro is 41 years old and a single mother of two school age children. She is originally from the village of la Quimera which is west of león. She is employed as a primary school teacher and she has 20 years of experience. This has allowed her  to bring home earnings each day to her family. She is a strong woman and entrepreneurial and she has been the mother and father for her children because she has given them love and ensured their well being without the help of their father. 

As a responsible mother, she travels 90km each day in order to arrive at the school where she teaches classes to children with few resources, yet always with the goal of passing on everything she can to her students.

With the intent to improve the conditions of her home, she is seeking financing from Kiva, through Ceprodel, to buy bricks, a toilet and a sink because she currently relies on a latrine in poor condition that make it very dangerous for her family. She hopes that these investments will help her with her need to improve the aforementioned conditions.

loans.use: to buy bricks, a toilet and a sink.

loans.name: Marcia Lorena

texts.es:
Marcia Lorena habita en el poblado del Sauce, un municipio al occidente de León donde la población es meramente ganadera.
En él hay mucho potencial turístico que atrae la atención sobre todo de los gringos que visitan seguidamente este pueblito tan alejado del bullicio de la ciudad. Se caracteriza por sus bellos paisajes naturales y el aire fresco y puro.
Marcia Lorena es una mujer de 42 años que tiene muchos años de dedicarse a la labor de maestra, casada con tres hijos que le transmite la mejor educación al igual que a sus alumnos, ya que es lo más valioso poder heredarles que sean personas de bien luchadores como ella.

En la actualidad tiene la necesidad de un crédito para realizarse una cirugía de la vesícula ya que por muchos años le ha dado problemas este órgano y que hoy necesita combatir esto través de esta operación la cual confía en Dios que todo salga bien para seguir adelante y dar lo mejor como madre y maestra.
Por tal motivo solicita el apoyo de estos inversionistas que han ayudado mucho a las personas de escasos recursos de nuestro país Nicaragua.
texts.en:
Marcia Lorena lives in the village of Sauce, a town to the west of  León  where the population is primarily ranchers. In the town there is a lot of tourism potential that gets attention, most of all the visitors that come to this small town to get away from the bustle of the city. It is characterized by its beautiful natural scenery and fresh and pure air. 

Marcia Lorena is a women who is 42 years old who has spent many years employed as a teacher. She is married with three children whom she gave the best education, equal to her students, because it is very valuable for them to inherit being good people and fighters like her.

Currently she has the need to obtain a loan to complete a gallbladder surgery because for many years this organ has given her problems. Today she needs to combat this through this operation. She trusts in God that all will go well so she can continue to get ahead and to give her best as a mother and teacher. This is her motive for seeking the support of these investors that have helped a lot the people with limited resources in her country of Nicaragua.

loans.use: to pay for surgery.

loans.name: Yelva Aracelly

texts.es:
Mina La India es un bonito poblado como de 50 casitas, muy limpio con habitantes muy trabajadores y luchadores unidos todos por el bien común.
En él habita doña Yelva Aracely una señora de 40 años, casada, madre de tres hijos todos en edad escolar.
Como madre abnegada y responsable se sacrifica a diario levantándose a las 4 am a dejarles preparados el alimento a sus hijos para luego viajar 30 km hacia la comarca las Mojarras a impartir clases de primaría a niños de ese caserío, empleo que le permite ayudar a su esposo a llevar el sustento al hogar.
Cuenta con la paciencia y dedicación para enseñarles a estos niños a leer y escribir la misma con la que le dedica a sus hijos, ya que estos son el futuro de nuestro país.
Con el deseo de mejorar su humilde vivienda y brindar protección a sus hijos, además de prevenir el robo está solicitando un crédito a Kiva a través de Ceprodel para comprar dos verjas o sea protectores de hierro para las puertas y tener mayor seguridad al ingresar a la vivienda.
Confía en Dios y la virgen María que su solicitud sea aprobada para llevar a cabo su objetivo.
texts.en:
Mina La India is a beautiful village with about 50 houses. It's very clean with hardworking and determined residents all united for the common good.

Yelva Aracely is a 40-year-old, married, mother of three school aged children. As a devoted and responsible mother, she scarifies daily, waking up at 4am to leave prepared food for her children and then travel 30 km to the region of Mojarras to teach elementary level children from this small village, a job that allows her to help her husband bring home money. She relies on patience and dedication to teach these children to read and write, the same with which she devotes to her children, because they are the future of our country.

With the desire to improve her humble home and provide protection to her children, in addition to preventing theft, she is requesting a loan from Kiva through Ceprodel to buy two gates or iron guards for doors to have more security for the house. She trusts in God and the Virgin Mary that her request is approved to carry out her objective.

loans.use: to buy two gates (door protectors).

loans.name: Candida Rosa

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón una bella ciudad ubicada en el departamento de León, donde cuenta con empresas productora como es la Yesera que ha sido de mucha importancia, ha generado empleo a todo los habitantes del municipio. 

Cándida Rosa es nacida y criada en este municipio con buenos costumbre y amor al trabajo que desde muy pequeña le enseñaron a sobrevivir con su propio Esfuerzo como es luchar para su familia. 

Actualmente trabaja en uno de los centro de enseñanza estudiantil, sus rendimiento han sido bueno, pero por un problema de salud que presenta a tenido problema en su empeño, por tal razón solicita un crédito con Ceprodel Para elaboraciones de exámenes y compra de medicamento, con esto ella considera que va a mejorar en su salud y va a obtener mejores rendimiento en su trabajo. 
Hoy en día Agradece a KIVA y Ceprodel por el apoyo con estos pequeños créditos que ayudara a mejorar la salud de su persona y el buen empeño en su trabajo de  los clientes  y de la misma forma agradece por la atención que le hemos brindado.
texts.en:
Santa Rosa del Peñón is a beautiful city located in the Department of León, where there are manufacturers like Yesera that have been very important and have generated employment for everyone in the city.

Cándida Rosa was born and raised in this city with good manners and love for her work; from very early on she was taught to survive and support her family on her own efforts. 

Currently she is working in one of the student learning centers. Her income has been good, but due to a health problem she has had trouble being persistent in her work, so she has asked for a loan from Ceprodel for further exams and to buy medication. With this she thinks she will be able to improve her health and will earn more income from her job.

Today she thanks KIVA and Ceprodel for their support with these small loans that help her to improve her health and her good efforts in her work with clients. She also thanks them for the attention they have given her.

loans.use: to buy medication

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for a university degree.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy corrugated roofing and wood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase cleaning materials and products to sell

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is a 41-year-old man. He is married and is the father to two sons and one daughter.

For the past five years, Mohammad has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income to his family.

Mohammad is requesting a 1,000 USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of purchasing a new engine for the taxi he drives and to pay for the costs of licensing it. This will increase the taxi capacity, thereby enabling him to work extra hours and to take additional internal and external requests, which will improve his family's income positively.

Mohammad is photographed next to his taxi.

loans.use: to pay for the license of his taxi and to purchase new engine.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy yarn and embroidered piecework

loans.name: Marilyn

texts.en: Marilyn is a 38-year-old woman who is confident she can lift her family out of their poor living conditions. She promised herself that she will provide a better life for her family. There are many businesses that she has been involved in, but her direct-selling business has continued to operate. She has been in this business for over three years. She wants to improve and boost her income from day-to-day sales. This led her to request a loan of 35,000 Philippine pesos to purchase perfume, shoes, blouses, cologne and lotion to sell. She hopes to obtain her requested loan to further improve and increase her income.

loans.use: to purchase perfume, shoes, blouses, cologne and lotion to sell

loans.name: Thérèse Nathalie

texts.fr: Thérèse est une jeune camerounaise de 29 ans, célibataire et mère d'une fille de 2 ans. Elle possède et gère un kiosque dans un coin de la ville depuis 5 ans où elle vend des crédits de communications, bananes. Dynamique et accueillant, elle considère que son stock de crédits est déjà insuffisant pour sa clientèle grandissante. le crédit qu'elle sollicite lui permettra d'acheter le crédit de communication en gros auprès de fournisseurs (grossistes d'Orange et de MTN). Les bénéfices escomptés vont lui permettra d'augmenter son capital et avoir un mini kiosque d'une part et de subvenir aux besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
Thérèse is a young 29-year-old woman from Cameroon.  She is single, with a two-year-old daughter.  She owns and runs a small stall in the city, where she has been selling telecommunication credit and bananas for the past five years.

Thérèse is a dynamic woman who greets her customers warmly.  She currently believes that her stock of telecommunication credit is too low to meet the increasing demand from her customers.  With the loan that she is requesting, she will be able to buy telecom credit in bulk quantities from operators (Orange and MTN wholesalers).

Her projected profits will help her to increase her capital, to own a booth, and to meet the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy telecommunication credit.

loans.name: Julia Emperatriz

texts.es:
Santa Rosa del Peñón se Llama una preciosa Ciudad donde se dedica a diferentes actividades comerciales, es aquí donde habita la joven Julia Emperatriz. 

Julia emperatriz se Llama la Joven de 33 años, nacida en este bello municipio, cuyo salario a duras penas cubre el sustento diario de su casa, se dedica a brindarle su servicio, desempeñando el cargo enfermera, cuenta con dos hijos bajo su cargo, casada su espeso cuenta con su empleo, el ayuda al sustento diario de su casa y ella pretende mejorar su vivienda. 

Considera que su casa está en malas condiciones, por tal razón se presentó a Ceprodel, para solicitar un pequeño crédito, para la compra de: Cemento Arena y Pago de Mano de Obra, con esto podrá mejorar su vivienda y así mantener más segura a su familia. 

  Estima que a fines de año su vivienda estará mejor, pero para entonces necesita que Ceprodel y Kiva le brinden este tipo de crédito, de momento solo cuenta con su buena salud, su capacidad de trabajo, y su honradez.
Agradezco a Dios como primer instancia por ser el iluminador cada uno de nosotros y el de estas personas que le trabajan a Kiva que piensan en el futuro de las persona de escaso recursos económico para que les siga iluminado y dándoles fuerza y así seguir brindándole más financiamiento.
texts.en:
Santa Rosa del Piñon is a beautiful town where people engage in various commercial activities. Here lives Julia Emperatriz, a young woman of 33, who was born in this lovely town.

With what she earns, she has great difficulty supporting her household. She works as a nurse, is married and has two children in her care. Her husband is employed, and helps to support the household. 
 
Her aim is to improve her home. She considers that her house is in need of repair, and that is why she approached Ceprodel to apply for a small loan. She will use it to buy cement, sand, and pay for labor. With this, she will be able to improve her home and provide her family with greater safety.

She reckons that by the end of the year, her home will be better. But by then, she needs Ceprodel and Kiva to offer her this kind of loan. At the moment, she has only her good health, her ability to work, and her integrity. 

She says, "I give thanks to God for being the Illuminator of each of us, and of the people who work with Kiva, who think about the future of low-income people. May he continue enlightening them and giving them the strength, so that they can continue offering financial assistance."

loans.use: To buy sand, cement, and pay for labor.

loans.name: Las Maravillas Group

texts.es: Este es el Grupo “Las Maravillas” que conforman 10 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio que pasan al ciclo 09. Gregoria tiene 47 años, conviviente con 05 hijos la cual uno de ellos en etapa escolar. Gregoria cuenta desde hace 02 años con una bodega de primera necesidad cuenta con clientes fidelizados. Gregoria solicito el préstamo para la compra de arroz, leche, aceite, pollo, azúcar. El sueño de Gregoria es de terminar de construir su casa. Gregoria se encuentra ubicada atrás es la tercera del lado izquierdo, viste polo celeste
texts.en: This is the Group “Las Maravillas” (The Wonders) made up of ten members who are engaged in various business activities that happened in cycle 9. Gregoria is 47 years old and lives with five children, one of whom is school aged. For 2 years Gregoria has had a basic goods grocery store with loyal customers. Gregoria is requesting a loan to purchase rice, milk, oil, chicken and sugar. Gregoria's dream is to finish building her house. Gregoria is the third on the left side, dressed in a light blue polo shirt.

loans.use: to purchase rice, milk, oil, chicken and sugar.

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 33-year-old man. He is married and the father of two sons. For the past four months, Ahmad has been driving a taxi which has been a profitable business and the only source of income for his family. He needs support to cover some costs. Ahmad is requesting a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN to help him cover the cost of purchasing a new engine for the taxi he drives. This will increase his capacity to work extra hours and enable Ahmad to take on additional internal and external requests which will improve his family's income.

Ahmad is photographed next to his taxi.

======================================
About Shariah-compliant lending:
FATEN offers loan products that are designed to serve borrowers all over Palestine, including some religiously conservative areas. A key tenet of Islam is the prohibition of interest in the lending or accepting of money. This prohibition is based on the belief that money should be seen only as a medium of exchange and that it has no value in itself. FATEN has adapted the terms of this loan to fit the cultural context by attaching a 0% interest rate to the loan. In order to cover its costs, FATEN does charge a servicing fee. The amount you see fundraising includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you in accordance with the repayment schedule attached to this loan. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please visit Kiva's Muslim World Lending helptext: http://tinyurl.com/3aekx8m.

loans.use: to purchase a new engine for his taxi

loans.name: Ahmad

texts.en:
Ahmad is a 22-year-old single young man. He is employed and gets a low salary which is not enough to cover all his needs.

For the past two years, Ahmad has been selling flowers and seedlings to customers - mainly farmers. This has been a profitable project and a second source of income for him. However, from time to time his project needs more support to cover urgent costs.

Ahmad is requesting a 500 USD Youth Loan from FATEN to cover the costs of purchasing an additional collection of seasonal flowers and seedlings that customers often request. This will enable Ahmad to meet and satisfy his customers' requests, which will increase his sales and improve his income positively.

Ahmad is photographed in his project.

loans.use: to purchase flowers and seedlings to sell.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a 30-year-old single young man.

Hassan has been driving a taxi, which has been a profitable project and the only source of income for him, but from time to time he needs more support to improve his project and cover some costs.

Hassan is requesting a USD loan from FATEN to help him cover the costs of painting the taxi he drives. This will improve the taxi’s condition positively and ensure to Hassan better working conditions. This will lead to an increase in his income positively.

Hassan is photographed inside his taxi.

loans.use: to paint the taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a television.

loans.name: Marie Louise

texts.fr: Marie est une camerounaise de 46 ans, veuve et mère de 05 enfants. elle possède et gère une boutique de vente de d'oeufs dans un coin de la ville depuis 3 ans. C'est grace à cette activité qu'elle subvient aux besoins de sa famille. Expérimentée dans ce domaine, la bonne connaissance de ses fournisseurs lui permet d'acheter à de bon prix pour pouvoir ameliorer son activité. Elle sollicite ce crédit pour augmenter le stock de marchandises. les bénéfices générés par ce crédit lui permettront d'agrandir et diversifier son activité d'une part et économiser le reste pour subvenir aux besoins de sa famille (nutrition, santé, scolarité) d'autre part.
texts.en:
Marie is a 46-year-old woman from Cameroon.  She is a widow and the mother of five children.  She owns and runs a shop in the city, where she has been selling eggs for the past three years.  It is thanks to this activity that she supports her family.  She has a good experience in her field and knows her suppliers well, which allows her to get a good price for her merchandise and to improve her business.

She is requesting this loan to increase her stock of goods.  Profits generated thanks to this loan will allow her to expand and diversify her activity on the one hand and, on the other hand, to save some money to meet the various needs of her family (food, healthcare and schooling).

loans.use: to buy eggs.

loans.name: Gabriela Edith

texts.es:
Gabriela es una joven de 20 años de edad y vive al lado de su pareja y fruto de ese amor y cariño tienen un hijo de 8 meses de edad, a quien quiere mucho y junto a su esposo trabaja muy duro y se esfuerzan cada dia para poder brindarle a su pequeño todos los cuidados que necesita y sobre todo poder brindarle una vida digna. con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro Gabriela logro inciar su negocio de venta de jugo de naranjas y otras frutas de manera ambulatoria, logro comprar una carreta de jugos y con ella transita por las calles de su ciudad ofreciendo sus productos, Gabriela lleva trabajando en su pequeño negocio desde hace 2 años; ella cree que le va bien en su negocio porque es amable con los clientes y sobre tiene muchas ganas de salir adelante.

Gabriela esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la gran ayuda que le han brindado ella podra comprar una refrigeradora para su negocio ya que podra guardar sus insumos de menra adecuada y tambie realziar mejoras en su carreta de jugos ya que va remodelarla, asi podra mejorar sus ingresos y seguira luchando con muchas ganas para hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Darle una buena educacion a su hijo y poder seguir creciendo en su negocio".
texts.en:
Gabriela is a young woman, 20 years of age, who lives with her partner and the fruit of this love and affection is an 8-month-old son who she loves very much. Together with her husband, she works very hard and more every day to be able to offer her little one all the care he needs and above all, to be able to give him a worthy life. With great effort and savings, Gabriela was able to initiate her business selling orange juice and other fruits in the streets. And she hopes to buy a juice cart to use while navigating her city's streets offering her products. Gabriela has worked in her little business for  2 years. She believes business is going well because she treats her customers well and above all, because she has a strong urge to get ahead.

Gabriela is very grateful to Kiva lenders because, thanks to the great help they offer, she will be able to pay for her refrigerator, important for her business, and adequately preserve her supplies. She has also remodeled her juice cart, thus improving her income. She will continue struggling with great effort to make her grand dream a reality: “To offer her son a good education and to continue growing her business.”

loans.use: to pay for her refrigerator and maintain and remodel her fruit and juice cart.

loans.name: Dania Del Rosario

texts.es:
El Sauce es un pueblo con una población bastante activa y dinámica, limpio que trabajan por el bien de la comunidad, tal es el caso de Dania del Rosario una señora de 42 años, casada, madre de tres hijos que se desempeña como maestra de primaria.
Tiene 20 años de caminar 15 km a diario para poder llegar a la escuelita donde imparte clases y a pesar de los años siempre se esfuerza por darles la mejor enseñanza con entusiasmo a sus alumnos, ya que escogió la profesión que le apasionaba, lo que la hace una mujer admirable.

En la actualidad se ha sentido un poco mal de salud por lo que necesita un crédito para comprar medicamentos y realizarse una serie de exámenes médicos con el fin de detectar el problema que le está ocasionando su malestar de salud.
Espera que estos inversionistas de buen corazón apoyen su solicitud ya que por su bajo salario no puede cubrir estos gastos y su mayor deseo es mejorar para asistir nuevamente a su empleo y seguir adelante, ya que este es su única fuente de ingreso que le permite pagar los gastos del hogar y la escuela de sus hijos.
texts.en:
El Sauce is a town with a quite active, clean and dynamic population that works for the good of the community, so it is the case for Dania Rosario a 42-year-old married mother of three children primary school teacher. For 20 years she has walked 15km daily to be able to arrive at the small school where she teaches and in spite of the years she always makes an effort to give the best education with enthusiasm to her students, since she chose the profession that she is passionate about, which makes her an admirable woman.

Nowadays she has been in poor health and that is why she needs a loan, to buy medication and to do a series of medical examinations to find the cause of her bad health. She hopes that these good hearted investors support her request since her low salary won't be able to cover these expenses. Her greatest wish is to get better to return to work and continue ahead as this is her only source of income that allows her to pay for the household expenses and schooling for her children.

loans.use: to buy medication and to do a series of medical examinations.

loans.name: Liana Del Carmen

texts.es: Liana del Carmen52 años de edad, soltera con tres hijo de 35,31 y 24 años de edad todos ellos son independientes, ella se dedica a la venta de mercadería en general principalmente en prendas de oro, plata entre otros, sus compras son al contado en mercados de mayoreos y bisneras de Panamá y Costa Rica, sus ventas son al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales, negocio que lo realiza a domicilio y de forma ambulante desde hace más de 33 años , ella ha venido superándose gracia con el  apoyo económico que se le ha brindado para invertir en su negocio y así satisfacer el incremento de  demanda que ha tenido últimamente de su clientes, Liana solicita financiamiento para la compra de nuevos producto como son: ropa interior fina y corrientes, pantalones variados para damas y caballeros, blusas de diferentes estilo, maquillajes, prendas de platas y oro de diferentes estilos para asi ofrecerles una gran variedad de productos a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Liana del Carmen, age 52, is single and has three children, ages 35, 31, and 24.  All of them are independent.

She sells general merchandise, primarily gold and silver jewelry, among others.  She makes her purchases for cash at the wholesale markets and from individual businessmen in Panamá and Costa Rica.  She sells for cash and credit to her fixed and casual customers.  She has been conducting her business at home and in an itinerant manner for over 33 years.  

She has been succeeding thanks to the financial help she has been given in order to invest in her business.  She does this to satisfy the increase in customer demand that she has been experiencing lately.

Liana is requesting a loan to buy new products like elegant and everyday underwear, various men’s and women’s pants, different styles of blouses, make-up, and different styles of silver and gold jewelry.  She will do this to offer her customers a great variety of products.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise by purchasing things like clothes, shoes, and silver jewelry, among others.

loans.name: Osama

texts.en:
Osama, who is photographed next to his taxi, is a 34-year-old married man and a father of two sons and two daughters. Osama lives a modest life with his family in the Jabalia area located in Gaza City. He is employed, but earns a low salary which is not enough to cover all of his costs and provide for his family's needs.

Osama has also been a taxi driver for the past three months. He wants to have his own taxi in order to work on his own project. It is a step to increase his income and provide his family with better living conditions.

Osama is requesting a USD Murabaha loan from FATEN to purchase his own taxi. This will help Osama to feel free to work extra hours and take more internal and external requests, which will lead to an increase in his income and better living conditions for his family.

About Shariah-compliant lending:
FATEN offers loan products that are designed to serve borrowers all over Palestine, including some religiously conservative areas. A key tenet of Islam is the prohibition of interest in the lending or accepting of money. This prohibition is based on the belief that money should be seen only as a medium of exchange and that it has no value in itself. FATEN has adapted the terms of this loan to fit the cultural context by attaching a 0% interest rate to the loan. In order to cover its costs, FATEN does charge a servicing fee. The amount you see fundraising includes both the principal loan and the loan servicing fees. As with all Kiva loans, you should expect to have your funds returned to you in accordance with the repayment schedule attached to this loan. For more information on lending in the Muslim world, please visit Kiva's Muslim World Lending helptext: http://tinyurl.com/3aekx8m.

loans.use: To purchase his own taxi.

loans.name: Haroldo

texts.es: Haroldo  42 años edad soltero con 1 hijo de 13 años estudiante de primaria, inicia su negocio de venta de ropa nueva variada, fajas, gorras entre otros, desde muy temprana edad a sus 16 años porque lo aprendió de sus mama, a sus 26 años se independiza como vendedor ambulante y 5 años más logra comprar el derecho de un tramo en el mercado central, aun con el tramo los fines de semana se traslada al campo para mantener a sus clientes, el las compras las realiza al contado en mercados de mayoreo y las vende al contado y al crédito a clientes fijos y eventuales, Haroldo ha luchado por mejorar la calidad de vida para el y su hijo. el motivo del financiamiento es para invertir en  la compra de pantalones, camisas, faldas y trajes. Uno de sus sueños es mejorar su vivienda y ampliar su negocio.
texts.en:
Haroldo, age 42, is single, and he has a 13 year old son who goes to elementary school.  Haroldo started in the business of selling various new clothes, belts, and hats, among others, at the very early age of 16.  He learned from his mother.  He became an independent itinerant seller when he was 26.  Five years later he managed to buy the right to a stand at the central market.  On the week-ends he even takes his stand to the field to keep his customers.

He makes his purchases for cash at the wholesale markets.  He sells for cash and credit to his fixed and casual customers.  Haroldo has struggled to improve the quality of life for himself and for his son.

The loan is to buy pants, shirts, skirts, and outfits.  One of his dreams is to improve his house and to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy new clothes, belts, and hats, among others.

loans.name: Todo Lo Puedo En Cristo Group

texts.es:
¡Saludos desde Perú! Este es el  grupo Todo lo puedo en Cristo

Este grupo está conformado por 07 socias que se conocen entre sí. Ofelia es la Tesorera del grupo, ella  tiene 55 años, es casada con 04 hijos. Ofelia empezó su propio negocio hace 08 años tiene una Boutique donde vende toda clase de artículos como ropa, zapatos, regalos y perfumería. Tener su propio negocio la hace muy feliz porque le permite ser independiente y ayudar a sus hijos. Ofelia trabaja diariamente aproximadamente 12 horas, sus principales clientes son señoras y jóvenes que siempre acuden a su negocio por los artículos novedosos que ofrece, gracias a  su préstamo podrá adquirir más productos para incorporar a su boutique, en adelante le gustaría que su negocio siga creciendo y que sus hijos se sientan orgullosos de ella.
Ofelia está muy agradecida por el préstamo que recibirá, a EDAPROSPO por otorgarlo y a los Inversionistas KIVA que lo hacen posible.
Ofelia  aparece en la foto vestida con jean azul, polo rosado y chompa marrón.
texts.en:
Greetings from Peru! 

This it is the group Todo lo puedo en Cristo (Everything I can do in Christ). This group is made up of 7 members who know each other. Ofelia is the Treasurer of the group; she is 55 years old and married with 4 children. Ofelia began her own business 8 years ago. She has a boutique where she sells all types of items such as clothes, shoes, gifts and perfume. It makes her very happy to have her own business because it allows her to be independent and to help her children. Ofelia works approximately 12 hours daily, her main customers are ladies and young people who always go to her store for new items. 

Thanks to the loan she will be able to get more products to add to her boutique. From now on she would like her business to continue growing and that her children feel proud of her. Ofelia is very grateful for the loan that she will receive; to EDAPROSPO for grating it and to the Kiva lenders who make it possible.

Ofelia appears in the photo dressed in blue jeans, a pink polo shirt and brown sweater.

loans.use: to buy products for her boutique.

loans.name: María Isolda

texts.es:
En el balneario de San Clemente en el Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 53 años de edad, está casada y fruto de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad e independientes. Su esposo ya no trabaja por motivos de su salud.

Doña María al ver que ya su esposo no podía trabajar con los ahorros que tenían  puso un pequeño bazar el mismo que lo tiene en su casa y en el cual junto a su esposo atienden, allí trabajan todos los días aunque reconoce que los días que más vende son los fines de semana días en los cuales llegan muchos turistas hasta este hermoso balneario. Allí vende de todo un poco desde ropa, zapatos, hasta helados,  sodas, hielo y muchos otros productos que sus clientes necesitan. Lleva 5 años con su negocio y es ahora la única fuente de ingresos que tienen para salir adelante.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito con Kiva y esto es porque los créditos le ayudan mucho, con las ganancias obtenidas en este ciclo ella pudo comprar una vitrina la misma que le sirve para exhibir su mercadería, esto le facilita sus ventas ya que los clientes desde afuera de su casa ven lo que les gusta y entran a comprar, en cuanto a los pagos siempre fue cumplida.  Este crédito lo va a emplear en surtir mas su bazar va a comprar ropa, zapatos, carteras, etc. Está en el Banco Comunal hace más de  14 años  y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda la institución.
 
Sus metas son seguir adelante en su negocio y tener buena salud.
texts.en:
In the resort area, San Clemente, in Sucre canton, the “1st of December” Communal Bank meets every 2 weeks. The location is known for its beautiful beaches so often visited by many national and foreign tourists. San Clemente offers diverse beautiful spots and rich and varied local and regional dishes.

Maria, who lives here, is 53 years old, married, and the fruit of this union is 4 children, all of whom are now adult and independent. Her husband no longer works due to poor health.

Maria, upon seeing that her husband could no longer work, used the savings she had to open a small general store in her own home. She and her husband attend it every day, though they recognize that the days when they sell the most are the weekends, days when many tourists arrive to this beautiful resort area. Here they sell a little of everything, from clothing and shoes to ice cream, sodas, ice, and many other products that her customers need. The business is now 5 years old and it is now the only source of income they have for getting ahead.

Maria is again requesting a loan from Kiva because these loans help her greatly. With the earnings from this loan cycle, she can purchase a glass case that will serve to exhibit her merchandise, facilitating sales, since customers from outside her house will see what they like and enter to buy. 

Concerning repayment, she has always been reliable. This loan will be used to restock the general store, purchasing clothing, shoes, wallets, etc. Maria has been a member of her communal bank for more than 14 years and she likes it for the benefits the institution offers. Maria's goals are to continue ahead in her business and to enjoy good health.

loans.use: to buy clothing, shoes, and wallets to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase clothes for her store

loans.name: Asmaa

texts.en:
Asmaa is a 25-year-old young woman. She is married and a mother to one son and one daughter. Her husband is a worker who earns a low income, which is not enough to cover all the family's needs.
For the past four years, Asmaa has had a small sewing workshop in her house to sew clothes for customers. It has been a profitable project, but she needs more support to cover necessary costs and improve her project.
Asmaa is requesting a USD youth loan from FATEN to help her cover the costs of purchasing a new sewing machine to provide better quality to her loyal customers. This will increase sales and improve Asmaa's income.
Asmaa is photographed sewing clothes.

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Frank German

texts.es:
Frank es un joven de 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Pisco, la cual se caracteriza por tener un clima muy calido y acogedor, asimismo se pueden encontrar playas hermosas. Debido a sus pocos recursos economicos Frank solo pudo estudiar hasta el quinto grado de educacion secundaria, pero le hubeira gustado poder estudiar la carrera de adiminstracion de empresas.

Con mucha dedicacion Frank trabaja como mecanico en un pequeño taller mecánico, el labora alrededor de 8 horas al dia y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya con los gatsos del hogar a sus padres.

Frank esta muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra comprar materiales como cemento, ladrillos, mayolicas, canalestas, tubos de PVC, entre otros ya que ñpodra construir su baño de material noble, ya que actualmente es de adobe y de esta manera el podra brindarle uan mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:" Tener su casa propia".
texts.en:
Frank is a young man aged 21. He lives in the town of Pisco which is known for its warm and welcoming climate. You can also find beautiful beaches there.

Because he didn’t have much money, Frank could only stay to grade 5 of secondary school, but he would have liked to study business.

Nowadays he works hard at his job as a mechanic in a small garage. He works about eight hours a day and his income helps support his parents.

Frank is very grateful to Kiva donors as it is thanks to their help that he will be able to buy materials such as cement, bricks, tiles, guttering, and PVC pipes etc. so he can build a proper bathroom. The current one is made of adobe. In this way he will be able to provide his family with a better quality of life and continue his efforts to fulfill his dream of having a house of his own.

loans.use: to make improvements to the bathroom

loans.name: María De Lourdes

texts.es:
En el balneario de San Clemente del Cantón Sucre cada quince días se reúne el Banco Comunal 1 de Diciembre. Este lugar es conocido por sus hermosas playas que son muy visitadas por muchos turistas nacionales y extranjeros,  ofrece diversidad de lugares hermosos y una rica variedad de platos típicos de la región.

En este lugar vive la señora María, tiene 48 años de edad está casada y de esta relación  tiene tres hijos los mismos que ya son mayores de edad, dos de ellos aun viven en su casa. El marido es obrero.

Doña María es una gran ama de casa que para ganarse el sustento diario y ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que este no gana mucho, se dedica a la venta de  bocadillos y comidas rápidas, de sodas, aguas, jugos, entre otras cosas. Trabaja todos los días desde las 15h00 hasta las 21h00. A ella le ha ido muy bien en su negocio y es así como contribuye con los gastos del hogar y mucho más cuando su esposo se queda sin trabajo, lleva más de 23 años con este negocio el cual le ha servido para ayudar a sacar adelante a su familia.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito ya que esta es la única manera que tiene para financiar su negocio y con esto poder salir adelante junto a su familia, gracias a sus ganancias ella pudo comprar alimentos para su familia ya que su esposo estuvo bastante tiempo sin trabajo, en cuanto a los pagos siempre se mantuvo al día ya que para ella es muy importante cumplir para seguir recibiendo los créditos. Este crédito lo va utilizar en comprar carne, sodas, jugos y otros víveres para preparar los alimentos.
 
Esta desde el inicio  en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos salen muy rápido y sin tantos requisitos.
texts.en:
In the seaside city of San Clemente, in the Sucre canton, the Community Bank 1 de Diciembre meets fortnightly. This place is known for its beautiful beaches that are visited by many national and foreign tourists. It offers variety of beautiful places and a rich variety of typical dishes of the region.

In this place lives María, who is 48 years old, is married and has three children who are adults, two of them still living in her house. Her husband is a laborer and María is a housewife. 

In order to earn her daily livelihood and help her husband with the household expenses, because he doesn't earn much, she sells snacks, fast foods, sodas, waters, and juices, among other things. She works every day from 3pm to 9pm. She has done very well in her business and that's the way she contributes with the household expenses and especially when her husband is out of work. She has more than 23 years in this business which has served to bring her family up.

She is repeating the loan because this is the only way she has to fund her business and to get ahead with her family. Thanks to the profits, she was able to buy food for her family because her husband was out of work for a long time. 

Regarding payments, they are always kept up to date because this is very important to her. She wants to pay them so she can continue receiving loans. This loan will be used to buy meat, sodas, juices and other provisions for food preparation. She belongs to the Community Bank since the beginning and she likes it because the loans are provided fast and without many requirements.

loans.use: to buy meat, sodas, juices, and other provisions.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.es:
Jacqueline, de 29 años, es una mujer buena, amable y muy dinámica. Es soltera y no tiene hijos. Vive en compañía de su madre a quien desea brindarle una mejor calidad de vida. Habitando juntas en su local alquilado. 
El negocio de Jacqueline consiste en la venta de calzados usados como zapatos, zapatillas, sandalias y otros. Todos estos productos los trae desde la capital buscando los mejores modelos  de acuerdo a sus gustos y necesidades. Los vende en su local alquilado,  siempre atiende con una sonrisa en sus labios,  por eso tiene muchos clientes y ventas.
Se indicio vendiendo productos de segunda, pero con el tiempo fue incrementando su capital y ahora vende calzados, lleva en el negocio más de 03 años y desea continuar haciéndolo por muchos tiempo.
Considera su negocio rentable por las buenas ganancias que le deja y también por tiene regulares clientes quienes acuden diariamente a su local comercial.
Le gusta mucho su trabajo ya que le permite tener un ingreso económico para solventar sus gastos,  además de sentirse una persona productiva, desenado convertirse en una prospera empresaria. Tiene buenas ventas y eso le permite tener buenos ingresos.  Espera compararse una casa propia y abrir su negocio en ella.
Por tanto éste será su préstamo  número 2 con la institución  MFP, está muy contenta de saber que contará con  un apoyo financiero ya que le permitirá estar más tranquila y avanzar con sus objetivos, además se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual.  Por otro lado, buscará integrase más con su banco comunal que son muy solidarios.
Con el monto solicitado 1500 nuevos soles, comprará calzados usados para damas y caballeros, como zapatillas, zapatos y sandalias para aumentar la variedad que ofrece. Buscando precios bajos por el volumen de sus compras para aumentar el margen de sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Jacqueline, 29 years old, is a good woman, kind and very dynamic.  She is single and does not have children.  She lives with her mother, whom she hopes to provide a better quality of life.  The live together in a rented space.

Jacqueline's business consists of selling used footwear, such as shoes, slippers, sandals, and others.  She brings all these products back from the capital and looks for the best styles according to what she likes and needs.  She sells them in her rented shop, always attending her clients with a smile on her face.  For this reason she has many clients and makes many sales.

She began by selling secondhand products, but with time her capital was increasing and she now sells footwear.  She has had the business for more than three years and hopes to continue doing this for a long time.

She considers her business profitable due to the good earnings it provides her as well as for the regular clients that turn up daily to her store.  She enjoys her work very much since it allows her sufficient income to pay her bills, besides helping her feel like a productive person.  She hopes to become a prosperous businesswoman.  She has good sales and that permits her to have good income.  She hopes to buy her own house and open her business there.

So, this will be her second loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial support that will allow her to feel more secure and advance with her goals.  She promises to make her payments on-time.  In addition, she will look for ways to get more involved with her community bank, whose members are very supportive.  

With the amount requested, 600 dollars (1500 nuevos soles), she will buy used footwear for both gentlemen and ladies, like slippers, shoes, and sandals, in order to increase the variety that she offers.  She will look for low prices in a bulk purchase that will increase her profit margins.

loans.use: to buy used footwear for both gentlemen and ladies, like slippers, shoes, and sandals, in order to increase the variety that she offers.

loans.name: Natividad

texts.es:
Natividad, de 40 años, es una mujer buena y amable. Está casada con Eduardo quien se dedica al transporte y tienen 02 hijos quienes son su razón de esfuerzo y trabajo, ellos son Nora de 17 años y Tedy de 06 años de edad. Vive en su casa propia a lado de su esposo y sus hijos. Lo que más desea es poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia por eso trabaja mucho para poder lograrlo.
El trabajo de Natividad consiste en la venta de comida como tallarines, frituras, pescados asados y otros También vende golosinas y bebidas gasificadas variadas. Su venta lo realiza  a diario en el interior de un centro educativo donde le permitieron tener un puesto de venta para satisfacer el hambre de los escolares y deleitarlos con su exquisita sazón.  
Se inició en le negocio hace más de 03 años y hasta el momento lo viene realizando con el apoyo de su esposo y su hijo ocasionalmente, además de una ayudante de concina en forma permanente a quien paga por semana de trabajo.
Considera su negocio bastante rentable por la continua clientela que tiene y las buenas ganancias que le deja.
Comenta que heredo la sazón de su madre quien le dio las lecciones sobre como cocinar y como realizar buenas ventas.
Considera rentable su negocio  ya que le permite tener ingresos económicos para que pueda brindar a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.  Espera poder seguir trabajando para así poder progresar y salir adelante con su familia, tiene muchos planes pero por el memento espera la expansión de su negocio. Por tanto éste será el préstamo  número 18 con MFP, desea continuar con su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además se siente muy a gusto de poder trabajar con su banco comunal ya que son buenos y muy responsables.
Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará ingredientes y víveres para la preparación de sus comidas  como pollos, carnes, arroz, aceites y otros, además de implementar su pequeño puesto de golosinas para así ofrecer mayor variedad a sus clientes. Buscando en ambos casos precios bajos por el volumen de compras para aumentar el margen de sus ganancias.
texts.en:
Natividad, 40 years old, is a good and friendly woman. She is married to Eduardo who works in transportation and they have 2 children who are her reason for effort and work. They are Nora, 17 years old, and Tedy, 6 years old. She lives in her own house at the side of her husband and their children. What she wants more than anything is to be able to provide a better quality of life to her family, and for that reason she works a lot to be able to achieve it. 

The work of Natividad consists of the sale of food, including noodles, fried food, and grilled fish. She also sells lollipops and a variety of sodas. She makes her sales daily inside a school where they let her have a food stand in order to satisfy the hunger of the students and delight them with her exquisite cooking. 

She started the business more than 3 years ago, and up to this moment she has been able to do it with the support of her husband and occasionally her son, in addition to a helper in the kitchen who she pays for each week of work. 

She considers her business to be very worthwhile due to the continuing customers that she has and the good profits that she makes. She comments that she received her cooking skills from her mother, who gave her lessons about cooking and how to have good sales. 

She also considers her business to be worthwhile because it lets her have income so that she is able to provide her family while a better quality of life. She hopes to be able to continue working to be able to make progress and move forward with her family. She has many plans but at the moment she is hoping to expand her business. This will be the 18th loan with MFP. She wishes to continue her collaboration in order to continue her objectives. For her part, she is committed to making her payments on time like the previous loans she had. Additionally, she feels very comfortable working with this communal bank because they are good and very responsible. 

With the requested amount of 2000 soles, she will purchase the ingredients and supplies for the preparation of her food, like chicken, meat, rice, oil, and others, in addition to implementing her small candy stand in order to be able to offer a better variety for her customers. In both cases she will look for low prices due to the volume of purchases, in order to be able to increase her profit margin.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and supplies for the preparation of food, like chicken, meat, rice, oil, and others

loans.name: Jully

texts.es:
July, de 26 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, decidida y con deseos de progresar.  Es conviviente con Carlos quien es empleado y padre de sus 02 hijos. Vive en compañía de sus padres, 02 hermanos y sus pequeños hijos, habitando  en la casa de sus padres.
La actividad que realiza July, es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad en su bodega instalada en el interior de la casa de sus padres, donde atiende con productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, huevos, aceites, fideos y otros a sus clientes. 
Iniciándose hace más de 04 años, con un capital propio, al cual fue haciendo rotar e incrementar, viendo  la buena acogida que tiene ésta actividad lo realiza a pesar que perdió la pierna a causa de un tumor, eso no le quita las ganas de seguir progresando, contando para eso con el apoyo de su mamá en la atención.
Le gusta su actividad pues puede contar con un ingreso económico que le permite apoyar a su pareja con los gastos de alimentación y crianza de sus hijos, ya que muchas veces con el ingreso económico de él no les alcanzaba y pasaron algunas necesidades, siendo ayudados por sus padres. Viendo que eso no podía continuar así decidió iniciar su negocio, ahora cuenta con una regular clientela y  tiene planes de ampliar su negocio y con las ganancias  comprarse una pierna ortopédica. Por tanto éste será su préstamo  número 2 con la institución MFP, se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, para así tener un buen record crediticio. Además se siente cómoda con su grupo ya considera sus miembros ser personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado de 1000 nuevos soles, los invertirá en la compra de una mayor variedad de abarrotes para surtir su bodega como arroz, azúcar, fideos, golosinas, entre otros. Considera que con mayor variedad tendrá más preferencia de sus clientes y mayores ganancias.
texts.en:
26-year old July is a hardworking and committed woman with a great desire to get ahead in life. She lives with Carlos who has a job and is also the father of their two children. Her parents, two siblings and their small children also live with them in her parents’ house. 

July earns her living running a corner store from her parents’ house. She sells basic necessities like rice, sugar, eggs, oil, noodles etc. She began this work four years ago with her own money and she has managed to expand the business despite losing a leg because of a tumour. This didn’t stop her from continuing to make progress. Her mother helps serve customers in the store.

July enjoys her work as she is able to use her income to help her husband with household expenses and raise their children. Often the money he earns is not enough to cover all their needs, and they have to do without or rely on help from her parents.

As July didn’t want to continue living like that, she decided to start her business. Now she has regular customers and has plans to expand it. With the profits she plans to buy an orthopedic leg. This will be her second loan with MFP, and she promises to make the repayments so she has a good credit rating. July also feels comfortable with her group as they are responsible and committed people.

With the 1000 soles loan money, she will buy a greater variety of groceries to stock her store: rice, noodles, candy etc. She believes that  if she offers her customers a wider variety, they will choose her store and she will earn more money.

loans.use: buy a greater variety of groceries to stock her store: rice, noodles, candy etc.

loans.name: Gina Mariana

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Artesanal se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Jipijapa, cantón conocido con el nombre de la sultana del café por los extensos cultivos de café el cual tiene un sabor incomparable, por su gastronomía y por la calidez de su gente. 

En este lugar vive la señora Gina, tiene 48 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen dos hijos de  20 y 13 años que estudian en Universidad y  colegio. Su esposo es chofer.

Doña Gina con la intención de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto poder salir adelante en el hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa donde tiene un pequeño local. Trabaja tres días a la semana en sus recorridos, deja a crédito a sus clientes  y cobra cada quince días. Su mercadería  la va a comprar a  Guayaquil cada vez que necesita. Tiene más de 10 años que se dedica a esta actividad y le va muy bien.

Ella está repitiendo el crédito con la institución ya que es así como puede financiar su negocio el mismo que le produce para financiar los gastos de los estudios de sus hijos, ya que para ella eso es lo más importante, este crédito lo va emplear en comprar más mercadería como: pantalones, blusas, camisetas y ropa de niños para aprovechar esta época que es muy buena para sus ventas. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace más de 14 años  y le gusta por la ayuda que le han brindado durante todo este tiempo.
 
Sus sueños es ver que sus hijos terminen sus estudios y sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Artesanal Communal Bank meets every two weeks in Jipijapa Canton, known as "The Sultan of Coffee" for its extensive crops of incomparably flavored coffee, its cuisine, and the warmth of its residents.  Gina, 48, lives here.  She's married and has two children, ages 20 and 13, who are students in a university and a school.  Her husband is a driver.

Gina makes a living selling all types of clothing so she can earn something on her own to be able to get ahead in her household.  She sells door-to-door and also at home, where she has a small space.  She makes her rounds three days a week for a few hours, leaving things on credit with her customers and collecting every two weeks.  She goes to Guayaquil to buy her merchandise whenever she needs to.  She has made a living in this work for more than 10 years and it's going very well for her.

She's getting another loan with the institution because this is how she can finance her business, which produces the money for her to pay for her children's educational expenses, which is the most important thing for her.

She's going to use this loan to buy more merchandise such as pants, blouses, t-shirts, and children's clothing to take advantage of this season, which is very good for her sales.
