Katherine is 23 years old. She lives in Ica with her partner and two young children, whom she loves and who are her main reason for living. She is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who, along with her partner, dedicates all of her efforts to provide for her family.

Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to begin working, Katherine was not able to study a professional nursing degree, but she would have really liked to do so. She likes to read in her free time, and sometimes she cooks a delicious rice and chicken dish to share with her family.

On her own initiative and with plenty of effort and dedication, Katherine works in her small business selling clothing. She also rents out costumes. She works every day for 8 hours, beginning in the early morning. She is happy with her work and she believes that it is going well due to the friendly manner in which she treats her clients.

Katherine is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, she will be able to buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, and sand, among others. She would like to finish the construction of a room in her home. She will then be able to provide better security and well-being for her family. She will continue working and striving to make her greatest dream come true: to expand her business and own a large store.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Miguel Ángel

texts.es:
Estimados señores, don miguel se dedica a comercializar cal y sal en el norte de Nicaragua, negocio que tiene once años de tenerlo, con lo que ha podido salir adelante a su familia.
Antes de tener su microempresa era obrero en las minas de cal del municipio de san Rafael del sur, sin embargo por iniciativa propia y ahorros personales logra establecer su negocio en donde genera ingresos para el mantenimiento familiar.
En estos momentos necesita un financiamiento para hacer realidad su plan de inversión, en adquirir cal y sal para atender la demanda de sus clientes, quienes en su mayoría son dueños de ferreterías y ganaderos de la zona.
Su estado civil es acompañado y tienen dos hijos en edad escolar.
texts.en:
Ladies and Gentlemen, 

Miguel makes a living trading lime and salt in the north of Nicaragua. He has had this business for eleven years, which has allowed him to provide for his family.

Before owning his small business, he was a miner in the municipality of San Rafael del Sur. However, on his own initiative and using his personal savings, he managed to establish his business, in which he is able to generate income to maintain his family.

He is now in need of financing to make his investment plan a reality by acquiring lime and salt in order to fulfill the demand of his clients, who are mainly local hardware store owners and stockbreeders.

He lives with his spouse, and the couple have two children of school age.

loans.use: to buy lime and salt.

loans.name: Mayra

texts.es:
Mayra, es una señora ejemplar de profesión maestra de educación primaria, actualmente esta jubilada por afectación del polvillo de tiza, pero ejerce un negocio de venta de refrescos y  repostería, es casada su esposo y sus hijos trabajan en conjunto por contrato a una empresa de la zona donde habitan.
Actualmente presenta una necesidad de mejorar su casa como es la construcción de pared y reforzamiento de techo los que están en mal estado, por eso se presento a las oficinas de ceprodel para solicitar un financiamiento para comprar materiales como reglones, piedrín, cemento, arena, perlin, hierro y puertas, de esa manera mejorar las condiciones y nivel de vida.
Y agradeciéndole a ceprodel por el crédito oportuno y por el apoyo para lograr su sueño.
texts.en:
Mayra is an exemplary woman who is a primary teacher. Currently, she is retired because of effects from chalk dust, but she has a business that sells sodas and pastries. She is married. Her husband and children work together by contract in a company in the area in which they live.

Now, the necessity to improve her home has presented itself. It is the construction of the wall and reinforcement of the roof that are in poor condition, and because of that she presented herself in the offices of Ceprodel to request funding to buy material like screeds, gravel, cement, sand, purlin beams, iron, and doors. In this way, she will improve her living conditions and standard of living.

She also thanks Ceprodel for the timely loan and for the support to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy screeds, gravel, cement, sand, purlin beams, iron, and doors.

loans.name: Edwin Roberto

texts.es:
Edwin es un hombre de 35 años, vive en la ciudad de Nazca con sus dos pequeños hijos, a quienes ama y son su principal razón en la vida, el es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que dedica todos sus esfuerzos por sacar adelante a sus pequeños; lamentablemente por falta de recursos económicos y por la necesidad de trabajar, Edwin no pudo estudiar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado mucho poder hacerlo, en sus ratos libres le gusta escuchar música y en algunas ocasiones cocina una riquísima Caparulcra con Sopa Seca para compartir con su familia.
Por iniciativa propia, con mucho empeño y dedicación, Edwin trabaja como chofer de taxi, brindando servicios de transporte, el trabaja todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana y puede hacerlo por un aproximado de 12 horas, el se siente a gusto realizando su labor y cree que le va bien porque conoce las zonas donde encontrar mayor cantidad de pasajeros.
Edwin se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestamistas Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar el mejoramiento de su vivienda, ya que desea hacer el tarrajeo y pintado de su vivienda, así pues él seguirá trabajando y esforzándose para culminar la construcción de su vivienda y lograr su gran sueño de brindarles lo mejora a sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Edwin is 35 years old and lives in the city of Nazca with his two young children, whom he loves and who are his main reason for living. He is a very friendly, hardworking and enthusiastic person who dedicates all of his efforts to provide for his children.

Unfortunately, due to a lack of financial resources and the need to begin working, Edwin was not able to study a professional degree, but he would have very much liked to do so. He likes to listen to music in his free time, and occasionally he cooks a delicious Caparulcra con Sopa Seca (a Peruvian stew with pork and dehydrated potatoes) to share with his family.

By his own initiative and with plenty of effort and dedication, Edwin works as a taxi driver, offering transport services. He works for 12 hours every day, beginning in the early morning. He is happy with his work and he believes it is going well because he knows the areas where he can find a larger quantity of passengers.

Edwin is very grateful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to their help, he will be able to make improvements to his home. He would like to plaster and paint his home. He will continue working and striving to finish the construction of his home and to achieve his dream of giving the very best to his children.

loans.use: to make improvements to his home.

loans.name: Juana Yadira

texts.es:
Juana con 45 años de edad, originaria de Boaco, soltera, madre de 2 hijos mayores de edad, actualmente solo uno esta estudiando en la universidad, de oficio comerciante, se dedica al negocio de pulpería. Inicio en el ámbito del comercio vendiendo cosméticos, pero luego miro que no le era muy rentable este negocio y fue allí que decidió emprender otro negocio como es el de la pulpería del cual ha obtenido mejores ganancias, ella tiene clientes fijos, de esta manera ha podido incrementar sus ventas, ya que ella cuenta con otros ingresos como es el salario que gana de su trabajo, en su negocio recibe el apoyo de su hija quien le ayuda con  la administración. Sus expectativas es crecer en su pulpería  para comprar más productos que aun no tiene en inventario.
Juana solicita el financiamiento para comprar azúcar, aceite, arroz, frijoles, papel higiénico, jabón, gaseosa, etc. Ya que ella estima que este préstamo le ayudaría a comprar toda la mercadería en general que mas se vende para poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes, sus planes futuros es ampliar el negocio para tener mejores oportunidad de ventas, su meta próxima es comprar una vitrina para exhibir sus productos.
texts.en:
Juana is 45 years old and single with two older children, one of whom is studying at university. She is originally from Boaco. She is a businesswoman and has a small grocery store. 

She began her career in business by selling cosmetics, but she later realized that the business was not very profitable. She decided to launch another business, her grocery store, from which she has earned a better income. She has regular customers, which has allowed her to increase her sales. She is able to count on other earnings from her job, and her daughter helps her with the administration of the store. She hopes to grow her business in order to buy more products which she does not currently have in her inventory.

Juana is asking for financing to buy sugar, oil, rice, beans, toilet paper, soap, sodas, and other products. She estimates that this loan will help her to buy all of the merchandise which she sells in order to satisfy the needs of her customers. Her plan for the future is to expand her business to have greater sales opportunities. Her next goal is to buy a glass case to display her products.

loans.use: to buy sugar, oil, rice, beans, toilet paper, soap, soda, etc.

loans.name: Made

texts.en:
Made is a Balinese artisan who crafts silver and gemstone jewelry, by hand. Made would like to purchase additional sterling silver and gemstones in order to increase production. Made has been selling through NOVICA since 2002. This is her story:

"I come from a village long-renowned as Bali's center of silver production. My father was one of the senior silversmiths, well-trained in the jewelry arts. He taught me from when I was 12 years old until I got married. Though I graduated in anthropology, I decided to set up a workshop with my husband. We are now able to offer employment to more silversmiths in our village, and we specialize in traditional motifs and designs.

"This microcredit is really helpful to increase my stock and provide the capital to work. It is really needed to speed up the supply of items I market on-line. Thank you so much for your help to make this happen."

Use the link below to view Made's silver and gemstone jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/2974

loans.use: to purchase additional sterling silver and gemstones in order to increase jewelry production.

loans.name: Buana

texts.en:
Buana is an Indonesian artisan who crafts Bali's legendary silver jewelry. He would like to stock up on silver and gemstones to increase production. Buana has been selling through NOVICA since 2006. This is his story:

"I've been surrounded by handicrafts all my life. In 1990, I decided to focus on learning to make silver jewelry from one of my friends in Celuk. I learned it all, from the very basic skills like sanding, polishing, and making plates to very advanced techniques. I am thankful to God for giving me such a great gift, so I can make a living for my family. Not much, perhaps, but enough for our simple way of life.

"I really appreciate your help in funding this loan, which I will use to buy silver and gemstones. In the future, I want to create more new designs. I hope God blesses us and that this new year will be a good one. Thank you!"

Use the link below to view Buana's handmade jewelry on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/5503

loans.use: to stock up on silver and gemstones to increase jewelry production.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
Doña María es una mujer humilde ella vive en la ciudad de Ambato, ella tiene 21 años, María se define como una persona muy reservada, alegre, emprendedora muy trabajadora y feliz en los momentos que pasa con su familia, María tiene dos hijos una niña de 3 años y un niño de 4 años, María vive junto a su esposo y su hijos viven. María vio la manera de ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar y es por ello que se dedicó a la venta de ropa ya hace más de tres años.
El crédito solicitado a FODEMI se lo invertirá en la compra de ropa para luego vender en su local comercial, María va a comprar lo que es jeans, camisas, blusas, ternos deportivos para niños, damas y caballeros. María comenta que el trabajo es sacrificado pero tiene muchos réditos ya que se pasa en familia y cuando se pone muchas ganas las ganancias económicas son muy buenas.
El sueño que doña María tiene es el comprarse un local propio para trabajar junto a su esposo y con estas ganancias dar la educación a sus dos hijos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
María’s a humble woman living in the city of Ambato; she’s 21-years-old and defines herself as a reserved, cheerful, enterprising, very hardworking person who is happy when spending time with her family.  María has two children, a 3-year-old girl and a 4-year-old boy.  María lives with her husband and children.  María decided to start selling clothes more than three years ago as a way to help her husband with household expenses.

She’s asking FODEMI for a loan to buy clothes to then resell in her commercial locale.  María will buy jeans, shirts, children’s, women’s and men’s sportswear.  She comments that the work is demanding but quite rewarding because she spends her time with her family and when she puts much effort into it the economic profits are very good.  Her dream is to buy a place of her own to work in with her husband and with profits from it to provide schooling for her children and a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: María Elena De Jesús

texts.es:
María Elena de 63 años de edad, es una mujer llena de energía y experiencia. Tras haber laborado la mayor parte de su vida como empleada doméstica en una residencia, decidió emprender vuelo y montar su propio negocio en el oficio que aprendió desde su juventud, gracias a su madre. 
La modistería siempre ha sido una de sus mayores pasiones, por lo cual siente mucha satisfacción colocando su conocimiento al servicio de la comunidad. 

María es una mujer llena de sueños y retos que no descansa hasta lograr lo que se propone. Por esta razón desea comprar una máquina fileteadora que le permita mejorar la calidad en el servicio e incrementar sus ingresos para una mejor calidad de  vida. Es conciente que no cuenta con los recursos para realizar dicha inversión, por lo cual se encuentra solicitando un crédito.
texts.en:
María Elena, 63, is a woman who is full of energy and experience.  After having worked most of her life as a domestic employee in a private residence, she decided to take flight and start her own business that she’d learned since her youth thanks to her mother.  Dressmaking has always been one of her greatest passions which is why she feels so satisfied placing her knowledge at her community’s service.

María is a woman who is full of dreams and challenges; she does not rest until she attains what she sets out for herself.  Because of this, she wants to buy a special sewing machine that will allow her to improve the quality of the service she provides and increase her income to have a better quality of life.  She’s aware that she does not have the necessary resources to make said purchase which is why she’s requesting a loan.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine.
